solution_line_template: Henry and Paul collected a total of {henry_seashells}+{paul_seashells} = <<{henry_seashells}+{paul_seashells}={henry_paul_total}>>{henry_paul_total} seashells

To make a total of {initial_total_seashells}, Leo must have collected {initial_total_seashells}-{henry_paul_total} = <<{initial_total_seashells}-{henry_paul_total}={leo_seashells}>>{leo_seashells} seashells
He gave out a quarter of {leo_seashells} seashells which is {leo_seashells}*({quarter_fraction}) = <<{leo_seashells}*({quarter_fraction})={seashells_given_away}>>{seashells_given_away} seashells
They are now left with {initial_total_seashells}-{seashells_given_away} = <<{initial_total_seashells}-{seashells_given_away}={remaining_seashells}>>{remaining_seashells} seashells
